help-file.title: TACKLE
help-file.content:
Syntax: tackle <victim> Aggressive: Yes
A successful tackle will knock the victim down for a duration, causing both you and the victim to be unable to respond to any commands for a short period of time. If you fail to tackle successfully, you will lose your balance and fall to the ground. Some creatures may not be susceptible to a tackle, due to size or other considerations. Unlike bash, tackle may be used on any type of terrain.
